name: Deft Tempo
description: Head shots increase bullet jumping temporarily

name: Guided Ordnance
description: Increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

name: Gun Glide
description: Reduces recoil and spread while sliding

name: Rifle Ammo Mutation
description: Converts any unused ammo types collected into Rifle Ammo

name: Primed Rifle Ammo Mutation
description: Converts any unused ammo types collected into Rifle Ammo

name: Spring-Loaded Chamber
description: Increases rate of fire for a brief time upon reloading.

name: Tactical Reload
description: Adds passive reload over time while holstered
